articles.description: If this effortlessly multicultural, sex-positive comedy makes someone feel a little more comfortable about their place in the world, then it’s crushing it.
articles.content: And that kind of authenticity springs from the fact that so many of the people involved both in front of and behind the camera identify as queer themselves, including the director, writers, and stars… [+2100 chars]

articles.title: Mormon murder drama 'Under the Banner of Heaven' is riveting - New York Post
articles.description: “Under the Banner of Heaven” could easily be a chaotic mess. The star-studded FX miniseries has a large cast, a story that deals with tough moral issues and a lot of disparate plotlines — but…

articles.title: In ‘I Love That for You,’ Vanessa Bayer Sells Out - The New York Times
articles.description: The “Saturday Night Live” veteran’s new sitcom draws on her experience of childhood cancer and her obsession with home shopping TV.
articles.content: I didnt understand dating at all, she said. It was just playing catch up. Even out of college and into my 20s, I always was trying to fake being an adult. In an hours conversation, this was the close… [+1966 chars]

articles.author: Jon Porter
articles.title: Watch a raptor gets clotheslined in Jurassic World: Dominion's latest trailer - The Verge
articles.description: Jurassic World Dominion, releasing June 10th, has received a new trailer. It stars Chris Pratt and Bryce Dallas Howard, as well as Sam Neill, Laura Dern, and Jeff Goldblum, who are returning for the new entry.
articles.content: Dont fear the dinos
